## Navigator with Child Blocks Demo
This demonstrates the new Navigator component using actual child blocks as preview and detail components, rather than hardcoded component types.

Vertical.TextBlock:
## How This Works
- **Navigator** component uses `data` attribute for YAML content - **NavigatorPreview** and **NavigatorDetail** are child blocks that define the UI - Each gets `itemData` passed as context with the current item's data - Uses template syntax `{{itemData.name}}` to display dynamic content - Child blocks can be any Learning Observer blocks (TextBlock, TextArea, etc.) - Each team member's notes get unique IDs like `notes_about_ty`

## Benefits of Block-Based Approach
- **Reusable**: Any block can be used as preview/detail - **Flexible**: Mix text, inputs, images, etc. in custom layouts - **Composable**: Follows Learning Observer's component philosophy - **Powerful**: Each item can have its own interactive elements - **Analytics**: All interactions are tracked via lo_event system
